name: Ditzy Doo's Misadventure
description:
You play as Ditzy Doo, isolated in a strange place of portals, going through them reveals a boss to defeat, each boss has an easy, normal and hard mode with their own little tweaks to how difficulty affects them, can you beat them all?

How to Play:
Taking control of Ditzy Doo you must enter portals in order to fight the boss found within aim to knock down their remaining hit points before they can do the same to you, switch difficulty via the small portal to colour in the various orbs floating around the portals, every boss is capable of being beaten without taking damage.

Controls:
> W/A/S/D or Arrow keys to move
> Left or Right click to shoot
> Space bar to interact

Furthermore:
Way back in 2013 or there abouts I was really dipping my toes into the internet and it was during this time that I ended up stumbling upon the Youtube creator Mastermax888, and through him I was introduced to other aspects such as community, at some point or another he played a game called Rainbow Wake and feeling inspired I had made a fan game, originally under the alias of Foxknight01; a  running theme these fan games became for a while but I eventually hit a depressive spike and nuked my online presence, briefly coming back a few times before outright dropping it until I settled into my current presence.

Shameless Plug:
Want to support development of my games, both old and new? well you can, here!
